prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon with a pumpkin body and a flowing scarf.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that embodies the spirit of Halloween with orange and black colors.
Imagine a medium-sized creature inspired by a haunted pumpkin, featuring a mischievous grin.
Design a Pokemon that combines ghostly elements with a playful demeanor and autumn colors.
Generate an eerie Pokemon that roams forests, dressed in a ghostly shroud and holding a pumpkin.
Make a unique Pokemon that blends ghostly characteristics with a cute, whimsy design.
Give me a Pokemon that has a haunting presence with a friendly personality and autumnal colors.
